name: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures
overview: The fate of PacWorld lies with Pac and his loyal crew as they protect the Power Berries from falling into the sinister hands of Betrayus and his evil army of baddies.

episodes.name: The Adventure Begins (1)
episodes.overview: Thanks to the school bully, Pac-Man accidentally opens the portal to the Netherworld, unleashing an army of ghosts, led by the fiery Lord Betrayus! Lucky for Pac-World, the power-berries from the ancient Tree Of Life gives young Pac the ability to eat the ghosts... and burp out their eyeballs!

episodes.name: The Adventure Begins (2)
episodes.overview: PacWorld is under siege by ghosts and there is little Pac-Man can do about it without fresh berries from the Tree Of Life, which is hidden somewhere in the Netherworld and guarded not only by legions of ghosts, but fierce monsters as well!

episodes.name: No Pets Allowed... Especially Monsters (1)
episodes.overview: When Pac and friends keep defeating all his ghosts, Betrayus, with the help of the demented Dr. Buttocks, decides to clone an army of Netherworld monsters. Lucky for Pac, one little monster isn't really a monster at heart.

episodes.name: No Pets Allowed... Especially Monsters (2)
episodes.overview: Dr. Buttocks amps up the stakes by inventing the Molecular Magnifier to create gigantic Monsters. Meanwhile, Pac is in for more trouble than he bargained for when he adopts the little monster that saved his life.

episodes.name: All You Can Eat
episodes.overview: Lord Betrayus plans to render Pac powerless by getting Inky, Blinky, Pinky and Clyde to feed Pac so much he'll be too full to eat anything else... power berries or ghosts! But Pac isn't getting full, even when he's eating everything in both worlds!

episodes.name: President Possessed!
episodes.overview: Pac and his pals grow suspicious when President Spheros starts behaving strangely. They eventually realize that Spheros has been possessed. Unfortunately, he declares Pac and pals Public Enemies and puts out a city wide Pac-Man-Hunt!

episodes.name: Is Zit You or Is Zit Me?
episodes.overview: Pac gets a huge zit right before Class Picture Day. The more stressed Pac gets about it, the more zits appear, so Betrayus sends his meanest-mouthed ghosts to stress him to the breaking point - or in this case - popping point!

episodes.name: Pac to the Future
episodes.overview: When Pac and his pals get blasted into the past, he not only finally meets his parents -- and his Baby Pac self -- but has an adventure with them during PacWorld War I.

episodes.name: Heebo-Skeebo
episodes.overview: PacWorld Kingpin Obtuse is working for Betrayus and uses Skeebo to try and steal Pac's power berries, but the plan backfires when Skeebo uses the berries to turn himself into the super-powered Heebo-Skeebo.

episodes.name: Mission ImPacable!
episodes.overview: Pac-Man is physically controlled by Betrayus when he swallows a special micro-chip, and Pac's friends must help him infiltrate the Netherworld spy-style to retrieve the remote controller.

episodes.name: Nobody Knows
episodes.overview: Lord Betrayus steals the Repository of the ghosts' corporeal bodies, but not before Inky, Blinky, Pinky and Clyde nab one body to share between them. Then it's up to Pac, Cyli and Spiral to get the Repository back from the Netherworld.

episodes.name: Seems Like Old Times
episodes.overview: Accompanying Pac and friends on a mission, Sir Cumference tries to show that he is more than just an old scientist, he's still got it as a freedom fighter - but after some disastrous attempts, it soon becomes clear that he isn't quite the fighter he used to be.

episodes.name: Betrayus Turns the Heat Up
episodes.overview: PacWorld is becoming dangerously hot and its citizens mistakenly blame Sir C! Pac and Friends remain loyal to the elderly inventor and, together, they uncover a plot by Betrayus to terra-form PacWorld into a world just like the Netherworld prior to invasion and conquest.

episodes.name: Pac-Pong Fever
episodes.overview: The annual Pacolympics approach and allow for Aunt Spheria to reignite a Pac-Pong rivalry with her former Pac-Pong rival and wanna-be suitor - Lord Betrayus.

episodes.name: Driver's Pac
episodes.overview: To save Pac-World, Pac has to fly the Paccerchini into the Netherworld.

episodes.name: Jinxed
episodes.overview: Betrayus summons a Nether-Witch to curse Pac with bad luck.

episodes.name: Indiana Pac and the Temple of Slime
episodes.overview: An ancient artifact, once belonging to Pac's parent's, leads to a temple within a maze that may hold the secret to the Tree of Life.

episodes.name: Planet Pac verses the Ghosteroid
episodes.overview: In an attempt to save PacWorld from a giant Ghosteroid that is lured in by Dr. Buttocks, Pac-Man must grow to planet-sized proportions.

episodes.name: Stand By Your Pac-Man
episodes.overview: It's ValenPac Day and Pinky is so jealous of Pac's friendship with Cyli she tries to get rid of her rival, which winds up getting Pac captured by the Pacinator.

episodes.name: PacLantis
episodes.overview: When Dr. Buttocks acquires a map leading to the ancient lost city of PacLantis, Pac, Cyli and Spiral voyage to the bottom of the sea to try and beat Buttocks and Betrayus, and retrieve the legendary power Berry of Youth.

episodes.name: Jurassic Pac
episodes.overview: The diabolical Dr. Buttocks clones an army of radio-controlled prehistoric Pacasaurs to attack PacWorld. Only the primitive throwback "Pac Cong" can stop the savage saurians.

episodes.name: A Berry Scary Night
episodes.overview: Every 100 Halloweens, the two moons of PacWorld turn blue, so Betrayus summons the sinister Count Pacula to drain the last Yellow Orb in PacWorld.

episodes.name: The Great Chase!
episodes.overview: In order to learn the secret location of the Repository, Betrayus possesses his mother's body while Dr. Buttocks hypnotizes the President, who reverts back to a five year old that drives his brother and mother batty during a wild and wacky race against Pac and pals to see who gets to the repository first.

episodes.name: Robo Woes
episodes.overview: When a super gigantic Robot invades Pacopolis wielding a weapon that renders the power berries powerless, Pac-Man faces the ultimate challenge and nearly succumbs to doubts that without the berries he is not really a hero.

episodes.name: The Spy Who Slimed Me
episodes.overview: Pac must get help from an unexpected source when a spy ghost named Specter possesses Aunt Spheria's dog and infiltrates Sir Cumference's lab.

episodes.name: Invasion of the Pointy Heads
episodes.overview: When the Pointy-headed alien Apex strikes a deal with the Netherworld to join forces and take over PacWorld, Betrayus realizes the aliens are more duplicitous than he is.

episodes.name: Ride the Wild Pac-topus
episodes.overview: When Pac is asked to hold on to a golden key, Dr. Buttocks tries to steal it by using his re-programmed mind-control chip to control attractions at a carnival.

episodes.name: Meanie Genie
episodes.overview: Pac is tricked into finding a bottle holding a genie, who promises to grant his every wish. He soon learns that he must be very careful about what he wishes for.

episodes.name: Cave PAC-MAN
episodes.overview: Dr. Buttocks' latest shenanigans wind up defrosting a prehistoric Cave-Kid, who is soon pursued by scientists bent on locking him away - including Dr. B - so Pac and his pals are finally forced to risk it all and travel back in time to return him to prehistoric PacWorld.

episodes.name: Cosmic Contest
episodes.overview: The cranky and omnipotent Overlords, woken from their Space Nap Supreme by the sounds of a PacWorld Netherworld, Pointyhead battle royale, force the combatants to compete in a crazy race through multiple dangerous locales to decide which planet will be banished to another dimension, allowing the Overloards to get some sleep.

episodes.name: That Smarts!
episodes.overview: In the absence of Sir C, Pacopolis needs a new genius, especially after Dr. Buttocks hacks Sir C's computer and builds a giant indestructible robot. Pac gobbles up Brain Berry to help him save the day, but it may make him too smart for his own good.

episodes.name: Pac-Mania
episodes.overview: Pac's enjoying being a teen idol-like celebrity until a TV show based on him, Cyli and Spiral makes them look like fools. Pac doesn't know that Betrayus is the brains behind the show.

episodes.name: Rip Van Packle
episodes.overview: Pac is trying to locate the Pointy Planet and his parents when the aliens attack. Pac follows them into space where he is swallowed by giant worm hole and spat out 70 years in the future to find his friends have been living under Betrayus' rule ever since Pac disappeared.

episodes.name: Spooka-Bazooka!
episodes.overview: Pac-Man is "put out to pasture" when a new ghost-catching gizmo hits the market. But the Spooka-Bazooka is actually a fiendish Betrayus plot to conquer PacWorld.

episodes.name: The Pac Be With You
episodes.overview: When the ultimate super ninja ghost trains Betrayus' army, Pac has to learn a new fighting technique from Blinky.

episodes.name: The Shadow of the Were-Pac
episodes.overview: President Spheros decides to throw the spookiest Halloween party ever, but a series of mysterious Were-Pac attacks take scary to new heights, so Pac and pals must become super sleuths.

episodes.name: Cap'n Banshee and His Interstellar Buccaneers
episodes.overview: A summer sky cruise takes a turn for the worse when Pac and his pals are confronted by spectral space pirates bent on capturing Mooby Dick, a colossal cosmic cow.

episodes.name: A Hard Dazed Knight
episodes.overview: When Dr. Buttocks coats some ancient armor with his newly invented "Buttanium," he creates a ghost army that not even Pac Man can chew through while Sir C feels he's lost his edge and cannot create a counter weapon.

episodes.name: Happy Holidays and a Merry Berry Day
episodes.overview: As the holidays approach, Pac gets a surprise visit from his parents who are on a "top-secret mission" that compels him to hide them from even his closest friends, who become increasingly suspicious something is very wrong - and they may be very right.

episodes.name: Indiana Pac and the Dentures of Doom
